graphql.query:
{
  storeConfig {
    order_success_page_enable
    order_success_page_show_shipping_address
    order_success_page_show_shipping_method
    order_success_page_show_billing_address
    order_success_page_show_payment_method
    order_success_page_show_order_product
    order_success_page_show_order_status
    order_success_page_show_print_order_link
    order_success_page_show_reorder_link
    order_success_page_description
    order_success_page_thank_message
    order_success_page_size_thanks
    order_success_page_color_thanks
    order_success_page_text_before
    order_success_page_size_before_text
    order_success_page_color_text_before
    order_success_page_text_after
    order_success_page_size_after_text
    order_success_page_color_text_after
  }
}
